title: On the agreement of symplectic capacities in high dimension
abstract: A theorem of Gutt-Hutchings-Ramos asserts that all normalized symplectic capacities give the same value for monotone four-dimensional toric domains. We generalize this theorem to arbitrary dimension. The new ingredient in our proof is the construction of symplectic embeddings of "$L$-shaped" domains in any dimension into corresponding infinite cylinders; this resolves a conjecture of Gutt-Pereira-Ramos in the affirmative.
